terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.blocks
Class SecondBlocks.FloorTarget

java.lang.Object

          javax.media.j3d.Group
              terrapeer.vui.j3dui.feedback.MultiShape
                  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.blocks.SecondBlocks.FloorTarget
All Implemented Interfaces:
FeedbackTarget
Enclosing class:
SecondBlocks
public static final class SecondBlocks.FloorTarget
extends MultiShape

Wraps a target object for sliding, rotating, and lifting it inside a room with an X-Z floor plane. The wrapper includes feedback decorations implemented with visualization techniques, actuators that limit target manipulation to inside a room, and mappers for WRM sliding and direct rotation and lifting. If the target is a multishape it will be connected for feedback. The target will be centered for rotation and offset such that it sits on the floor.

Constructor Detail

SecondBlocks.FloorTarget

public SecondBlocks.FloorTarget(javax.media.j3d.Node target,
                                SecondBlocks.Room room,
                                ViewChangeSplitter viewSpltr,
                                InputDragSplitter absDrag,
                                InputDragSplitter relDrag,
                                FeedbackGroupManager groupMgr,
                                AppWorld world,
                                AppView view)
Constructs a FloorTarget.

Parameters:
target - Target object to be decorated and manipulated. Never null.
room - Room that the target is in.
viewSpltr - Source for view state changes. Never null.
absDrag - Source for absolute input drags. Used for target WRM sliding. Never null.
relDrag - Source for relative input drags. Used for target direct rotating and lifting. Never null.
world - The world that the target belongs to. Never null.
view - Host environment for the sound audio device. If null then no sound.
